Articles.Content: I take the hill. I erase all other people in universe from spacetime. except [@SnacklessKerbal](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/189037-snacklesskerbal/)

This person betrays you and sells into slavery.

So, not your hill.
No. This person will spontaneously combust if he does this. My hill.

All of them were thinking so.

Spoiler

![latest?cb=20131011113024](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/conan/images/0/08/Wheel_of_Pain2.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20131011113024)
Everyone is erased from space time except me. My hill forever.
You are now in a separate micro-universe where there are only you and a hill.

Come Thursday a new universe is created with everything as it is. [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) is left, alone, with no other intelligent (or unintelligent) life left besides him, as he is alone for all eternity, only to be consumed next Thursday come judgement day.

I make a little pit and build a concrete bunker in it, and put dirt on it. My hill!
I take the hill. My hill.

> 
> 
> 3 minutes ago, HansonKerman said:
> 
> 
> I take the hill. My hill.
> 

You kinda have to say *how* you take the hill, like 'I used zero point energy to lift up the hill and put it near my house. My hill' or something.

I take the hill by just taking the hill. DUH!

My HILL

> 
> 
> 1 minute ago, HansonKerman said:
> 
> 
> I take the hill by just taking the hill. DUH!
> 
> 
> 
> 
> My HILL
> 

This is going to get boring real fast.

I dig up the hill and load it on to several dump trucks. I load the dirt on to a 120- ton <abbr title="Single Stage to Orbit">SSTO</abbr> and drop it on Duna. My space hill.
I give up. Your hill.
I jump in your universe with the hill. I teleport the hill next to my house. My hill. You are chucked into a black hole. My hill.

> 
> 
> On 7/24/2018 at 6:34 PM, HansonKerman said:
> 
> 
> What is frackin' universe?
> 

oh, only THE MOST DOWNLOADED STARBOUND MOD EVER ON THE STEAM WORKSHOP 

I (using remitech, another starbound mod) become huge and  then splatter everyone across the 15th dimension. 

my big hill.

Becoming huge and splattering does not send people to ~~the shadow realm~~ the 15th dimension because that's not how physics works.

I uninstall your mods, making you unable to load your stuff.

My hill.

I summon Kraken from the realms of darkness, he takes you back into the shadows with him. After this process of establishing dominance I take the hill.

My hill.

You forgot to close the portal.  

Oops.

> > > 4 hours ago, FireKerb said: > > > Becoming huge and splattering does not send people to ~~the shadow realm~~ the 15th dimension because that's not how physics works. > > > > > I uninstall your mods, making you unable to load your stuff. > > > > > My hill. > That doesn’t essentially mean it’s still your hill. I take a risk, install FU, and become one of [@Fraston](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/188565-fraston/)‘s subjects. @Fraston‘s hill. (P.S. I don’t want to install FU because it can’t be uninstalled.
I uninstall your mods so you can’t load your stuff. I eat the hill. Everyone on the hill dies. I regurgitate the hill. My kinda messy hill.

I give my Protectors Broadsword to [@Fraston](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/188565-fraston/). They take the hill.

[@Fraston](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/188565-fraston/)‘s, kinda messy hill.
I eat [@Fraston](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/188565-fraston/) (without the broadsword) my hill.

I take my Broadsword and the hill. I move the hill to another star system. I deplete all of your Erchius Fuel.

[@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/)‘s hill.

I use my orbital weapons platform and fire several 5000- pound bunker busting chemical bombs, gassing everyone in the bunker hill to either die or get out. I set it on fire as the gas was also flammable to get rid of any left and storm the hill with an army of identicle Seal- Team-6 clones.

/run program

[@Kernel Kraken](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/181383-kernel-kraken/) deletion in progress

[print] RealKerbal3x's hill
cls
